result.reason: When opening a connection file while SQL Server mode is enabled, the application fails to switch the connection synchronizer from SqlConnectionsUpdateChecker to FileConnectionsUpdateChecker. This causes the application to erroneously detect updates from the database and revert to SQL mode immediately after loading the file.
result.approach: Modify Runtime.LoadConnections to update ConnectionsService.RemoteConnectionsSyncronizer based on the new connection mode (SQL vs File) before calling ConnectionsService.LoadConnections, ensuring the correct update checker is used and the previous one is disposed.
